entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
